function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Simultaneous data collection and analysis may lead to data contamination and bias in interpretation","Impact":"Inaccurate or skewed findings, leading to incorrect conclusions","Mitigation":"Conducting separate data collection and analysis phases to ensure data integrity","Technologies":"Data analysis software with built-in checks for bias and contamination","People":"Researchers, analysts, and anyone relying on the study findings","Owner":"Researchers, research supervisors, and data analysis professionals"},{"Description":"Combining and synthesizing information without rigorous validation may result in the propagation of inaccuracies","Impact":"Dissemination of incorrect or misleading information","Mitigation":"Implementing rigorous validation processes and peer review of synthesized information","Technologies":"Collaboration and review platforms for expert input and validation","People":"Readers, researchers, and anyone utilizing the synthesized information","Owner":"Researchers, peer reviewers, and validation experts"},{"Description":"Thematic analysis approach may introduce subjective bias and interpretation variability","Impact":"Misinterpretation of themes and categories, leading to flawed overarching conclusions","Mitigation":"Using multiple coders for cross-validation and inter-rater reliability checks","Technologies":"Qualitative analysis software with inter-coder reliability metrics","People":"Researchers, analysts, and reviewers involved in the thematic analysis","Owner":"Research supervisors, qualitative analysis experts, and reviewers"}]}
